name: HUNT! (ladroid)
description:
HUNT! - is a simple 1-bit prototype shooter game for Arduboy.

You can play this game directly from here :)

The ProjectABE Arduboy emulator (embedded above) is a wonderful project that lets everyone play HUNT! in their browser, but the emulator simply cannot replace the experience of playing on a physical Arduboy.  If you want the full experience of playing HUNT!, make sure you nab an Arduboy and load it up!

!!!IMPORTANT!!! 

Unfortunately, ProjectABE has some bugs with sound effect, and all sounds can be heard only in Arduboy :(

Description:

The idea is to kill enemies and avoid enemies. The main character has only one life.

Controls for the web and Arduboy:

* Arrows - moving

* B Button - attack / menu control

* A Button - menu control

Features:

- Randomly spawn enemies

- Character animations

- 1-bit sound effects (only in Arduboy)
